Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Florida Democrats voted to impose Sharia law on women, when in reality they voted against a bill that would have barred the use of foreign laws in some contexts.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Democrats' vote was in favor of imposing Sharia law on women, without providing enough evidence to support this assumption.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Florida Democrats voted to impose Sharia law on women.
